structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The board of adjustment shall have the power to hear and decide cases where it is alleged by an applicant that there is error in any order, requirement, decision, grant, or refusal made by an administrative official in the enforcement of the zoning regulation. Such appeal shall be taken within thirty (30) days.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 29, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 57.
